definition: confused/dizzy/giddy/to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness/to pass out

sentences.english: If the passenger airsick how you handle it?
sentences.chinese: 如果乘客晕机你该如何处理？

sentences.english: If you are susceptible to motion sickness, your best bet is to sit over the wing.
sentences.chinese: 如果你很容易晕机，你最好坐在机翼附近。

sentences.english: I'm not feeling well. Do you have some tablet for airsickness?
sentences.chinese: 我觉得不舒服。有治晕机的药吗？

sentences.english: I am not feeling very well. I think I am airsick.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉不舒服，我想我晕机了，我换下座位吗？

sentences.english: You're probably airsick , and I'll get some medicine for you right away.
sentences.chinese: 您很可能晕机了，我马上去给您送些药来。

sentences.english: I probably am a little airsick, some pills might be helpful.
sentences.chinese: 我可能有点晕机了，吃点药会有帮助。

sentences.english: May I have another airsickness bag?
sentences.chinese: 请给我另一个晕机呕吐袋好吗？

sentences.english: Give me some airsick ness pills please.
You’re probably airsick，and I’ll get some medicine for you right away.
sentences.chinese: 您很可能晕机了，我马上去给您弄些药来。

sentences.english: She felt cold and a little airsick.
Do you have any medicine for airsickness ?
Give me some medicine for airsickness,please.
The stewardess will give you an airsick pill or gum to chew.
sentences.chinese: 服务员会给你晕机药或让你嚼口香糖。

sentences.english: Do you have any medicine for airsickness?
May I have some medicine for airsickness?
sentences.chinese: 请给我一些晕机药好吗？

definition: altitude sickness/acute mountain sickness/abbr. to 高反[gao1 fan3]
to get off a plane/to deplane
altitude sickness/abbr. for 高原反應|高原反应[gao1 yuan2 fan3 ying4]
to adjust to a different time zone
to have difficulties sleeping in a bed other than one's own
to faint during acupuncture or injection
to feel sick when seeing blood
